title: The Money game
brief_description: Deals with the intricacies and machinations of macro economics, using an economics machine designed by Bruce Petty and actors representing a worker, the government, an employer, a financier, an underdeveloped nation and a foreign investor. Stars Noel Ferrier, Chris Haywood, Alistair Duncan, John Cheoung, Alfred Sandor, Joseph Furst, Nat Leeson. Suitable for upper secondary level.
